gomath Package¶

algebra Module¶

algorithm Module¶

calculus Module¶

gomath.calculus.differentiate(fn, x, dx)[source]¶

Calculate value by differentiate to x power function, but an error to some extent. fn: Differentiate target function. x: Differentiate start point. dx: Delta quantity from x.

gomath.calculus.diffn(fn)[source]¶

Make function to differentiate given function. fn: Differentiate target function.

gomath.calculus.simpson(fn, upper, lower, divnum=1000)[source]¶

Definite integral by simpson method.

gomath.calculus.trapezoid(upper, lower, divnum, func)[source]¶

Integral caluclation by trapezoid approximation.

geometry Module¶

gomath.geometry.heron(a, b, c)[source]¶

Calculate area by heron method.

gomath.geometry.polar2rectangular(r, rad)[source]¶

Polar to rectangular coordinate transform. r: polar coordinates value rad: radian value

gomath.geometry.trianglep(a, b, c)[source]¶

Check triangle formation condition satisfied.

linear Module¶

logic Module¶

Indicates pattern match failure.

gomath.logic.FAIL = None¶

Indicates pattern match success, with no valiables.

class gomath.logic.Symbol(value)[source]¶

Bases: object

Symbol type class as that in Lisp.

gomath.logic.natp(n)[source]¶

Is n Natural Number?.

gomath.logic.variablep(x)[source]¶

Is x a variable (a symbol begining with ?) ?

util Module¶

gomath.util.compose(*funcs)[source]¶

function compose

gomath.util.discriminant(formula)[source]¶

discriminant of quadratic equation return real root number

gomath.util.flatten(ls)[source]¶

nested list flatten

gomath.util.makeformatlist(size, initnum)[source]¶

make adapt size and filled initnum list

gomath.util.makelist(length, initvalue=None)[source]¶

make standard list requested length [object]*length is all value equal object.

gomath.util.nearchoice(target, sample)[source]¶

choice near value key is number type only. but should be modified algorithm.

gomath.util.newton_raphson(root, start, repeat)[source]¶

Iteration method to calculate near solution. root: Origin of square root. start: Repeat start value. repeat: Repeat limit.

gomath.util.normalize_formula(form, target)[source]¶

make 1 for simultanious linear equations

gomath.util.rands(start, end, size)[source]¶

make random list

gomath.util.readcsv(path)[source]¶

read csv file and return list

gomath.util.sleq(formulas)[source]¶

simultanious linear equations formura length 2 (so 2 dimention), should be inverse matrix use. but if LU resolve masterd, should be attempt to use it.

gomath.util.subtraction_formulas(formulas, target)[source]¶

make 0 for simultanious linear equations

gomath.util.swap(a, b)[source]¶

value swap function

gomath.util.tarai(x, y, z)[source]¶

Tarai function.(Takeuchi function) Used at benchmark.
